UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational design of syn-safencin, a novel linear antimicrobial peptide derived from the circular bacteriocin safencin AS-48.
Literature.Author: Fields FR, Carothers KE, Balsara RD, Ploplis VA, Castellino FJ, Lee SW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:25% Cytotoxicity=10 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=10 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=8µM),Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. phaseoli ATCC 9563(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=10µM),Streptococcus pyogenes GAS M1T1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas syringae(MIC=>=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(0-10% Inhibition=8µM)
